lines.text: Well, y'know those guys at the university with their ''computers''?
You can use computers to download things, right?
So maybe they... downloaded a statue? Through that wire? Plugged it into the phone jack?
Well, from what I know about computers, that shouldn't be possible.
You can't download physical objects over the phone connection, or so I hear.
Huh? What about those... facts machines?
That's just paper. I think the machine has the ink and the paper already inside, and the computer just...
...tells the machine how to draw it? I don't know. All that newfangled stuff is sorta beyond me.
Eh. It's probably a fad, anyway.
